full_threads.body: (Time: 30mins)

Thanks Joel,

Unfortunately the system won't direct to the correct link even if we update the eDM now. We have just advised our internal team to provide the correct one should they get questions.

Thanks for your help,

Christine

Hi Christine,

Thanks again for the details.

We’ve confirmed that https://unitronmarketing.com.au/ is live and working. However, the link in the EDM — which goes through Salesforce Marketing Cloud's tracking domain (https://click.m.unitron.com/... ) — is not redirecting to that site and is returning a 404 error instead.

This suggests the tracking link in the EDM was either:
  • Pointing to a page or asset in SFMC that no longer exists, or
  • Was incorrectly configured when the campaign was created.

To resolve this without needing to resend the EDM, your SFMC team can try the following:
  1. Log into Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
  2. Locate the email that was used to send the campaign.
  3. Review the destination URL for the link intended to go to unitronmarketing.com.au .
  4. Check if that link was meant to point to a Cloud Page, external redirect, or file.
  5. If the original destination is missing or incorrect, it can be recreated or adjusted to redirect properly to https://unitronmarketing.com.au/ .

Please let us know if your team is able to make this update.

If updating the link within SFMC isn’t possible, we recommend sending a short follow-up email with the correct direct link to ensure recipients can access the content.

Let us know how you'd like to proceed.

Hi guys,

That's correct, it was on Sales Force Marketing Cloud.

Is there a way for us to avoid sending out another eDM for it?

Thank you,

Christine

Thanks Andy,

Please keep us updated.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

We are looking into this, We understand the urgency and are actively looking into it.

The links you’ve shared appear to have been generated by your email platform — most likely Salesforce Marketing Cloud or a similar service — which we don’t have access to. Because of this, we’re unable to set up redirects for the following URLs:

  • https://user-content.s10.sfmc-content.com/unitronmarketing.com.au/
  • https://click.m.unitron.com/unitronmarketing.com.au/

Could you please confirm which EDM platform was used to send the campaign? That will help us guide the next steps.

Hi Christine,

Confirming we're looking into this right now.
And from this URL https://click.m.unitron.com/unitronmarketing.com.au/ to https://unitronmarketing.com.au/?

Hi guys,

Can you please urgently set up a re-direct from this URL https://user-content.s10.sfmc-content.com/unitronmarketing.com.au/ the link for the marketing catalogue in the attached eDM to this URL https://unitronmarketing.com.au/?

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Guys,

Please replace the social content tile with this image as the thumbnail.

Thanks

Nikki

Not sure why the file was empty. Here you go.

Nikki

Thanks Cindy!

Can you please use the updated version for the attached?

Hi Nikki.Ozeken@sonova.com, please refer to their email below.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine!

I hope you had a great weekend!

The Smile page is now live and we have updated the Marketing Catalogue page.

Please note that the website banner is currently on draft as the file in the folder can't be downloaded on our end.

If you can resend the file, that would be great.

Please let me know if there is anything else the we can help you with and we're happy to assist.

Thanks Cindy,

This is an important new platform launch for us, so it's very important that it goes live on Monday on time at 8am, 9am AEST the latest.

Thank you,

Christine
@joel I’ll leave the push from staging to live in your hands. Monday, 26 May 8am AEST. Thank you. cc @glen

Noted on this, Christine.

We’ll let you know once it’s live on Monday.

We’re excited to move this to completion and see the page go live!

Thanks Cindy,

Please go ahead and publish everything for Monday, 26 May 8am AEST.

If there are any headings or folders with missing content, please hide these and only publish once the correct content has been confirmed.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine.

The Product Catalogues have been completed.

I’ve also sent an email to Nikki regarding the missing content in the Product and Chargers folders, and we’re currently waiting for her to upload the files so we can proceed with the remaining uploads.
